typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		title as string,
		year as string,
		cast as string[],
		genres as string[]
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	format: 'document',
	systemColumns: true,
	throughput: 2000) ~> source1
source(output(
		title as string,
		year as string,
		cast as string[],
		genres as string[]
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'document',
	systemColumns: true) ~> source2
Aggregate1 alterRow(updateIf(true())) ~> AlterRow1
source1 filter(title == 'Caught' && toInteger(year) == 1900) ~> Filter1
Filter1, source2 join(source1@title == source2@title,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 aggregate(groupBy(source1@id),
	idnew = first(source2@id),
		title = first(source1@title)) ~> Aggregate1
AlterRow1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		title as string,
		year as string,
		cast as string[],
		genres as string[]
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'document',
	partitionKey: ['/title'],
	throughput: 2000,
	mapColumn(
		id,
		title
	)) ~> sink1
